resources.string: This is our privacy policy and licence agreement.The person that you add will be automatically added to cloud system and published to all users. Please accept it if you agree.

This is a simple contact-holder application. There is a navigation bar bottom of the screen you can use it to change the page. You can add person by pressing add contact. Just so you know, you can see the persons from the see contacts page. Please note that, the person you added will automatically save to the database and will be published to all users.
